summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 24K Gold Under Eye Mask– 20 Pairs- Under Eye Patches with Face Massager Roller, Anti-Aging Hyaluronic Acid Collagen Eye Masks for Dark Circles and Puffiness Dark Under Eyes Treatment Review Date: 2020/09/05 Store: FRLEDM Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 6.8 x 1.1 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '616985543564', 'Manufacturer': 'FRLEDM'} Review Text: I love using eye masks, so I got this, because there were 20 pairs in the box, which is a really good deal for the price. I also liked the ingredients listed. But after receiving this, I'm a little disappointed, because it says, "Main Ingredients" and it doesn't have a list of all the ingredients anywhere. So, I do wonder what else is in these.

Saying that - these stay on well, didn't bother my skin left my eye area soft. So, yes, a list of ingredients would've been nice, but I like them anyway.

As far as the vibrating facial massager wand - I didn't expect to use it, because I use stone rollers and stones on my face, but I can see this helping with lymphatic and sinus drainage, so I'll keep it on hand for that. It's actually a pretty nifty little gadget that takes a normal sized battery (and comes with it), so I kind of like it. :) Review Title: Great value for good eye masks. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: GIOVANNI Hemp Hydrating Hair Shine Spray, 4.3 oz. - Hemp Seed Oil, Aloe Vera, Frankincense Helps Stimulate Moisturize & Revitalize Damaged Hair, No Parabens, Color Safe, Lauryl & Laureth Sulfate Free Review Date: 2020/09/10 Store: GIOVANNI Product Description: ['GIOVANNI Hemp Hydrating Hair Shine Spray creates gloss that rocks, with a smooth surface that talks. This Mist will seal in any hairstyle, bridging the gap between natural and salon quality. GIOVANNI was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural product stores, and today is the #1 selling Hair Care* lines in the United States Natural Products Industry. But before there was a brand, there was a pioneer. Arthur Guidotti had a vision and a love for all things hair. He began developing his passion as a hairstylist in Hollywood and Beverly Hills. By the 1960s, Arthur was maturing his talents and decided to open his own salon, called On Sunset. The salon was a bustling site, on the famous Sunset Strip, and a hit with many Hollywood celebrities, including Lucille Ball. Since 1979 the GIOVANNI Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance. GIOVANNI is committed to creating only the highest-performance formulations, wrapped in aesthetically beautiful packaging and marketed with extraordinary visuals and graphics.*According to SPINs.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Frizz Control, Shine', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Frankincense', 'Liquid Volume': '5.6 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 4.75 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '18640', 'UPC': '716237186409', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/GIOR7', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Review Text: I have curly, dry, frizzy hair that needs lots of additional conditioning and is NEVER shiny. I'm always looking for products that add moisture, shine, and control to my hair.

I use the GIOVANNI Mousse Air-Turbo Charged Hair Styling Foam and really like it, so I was excited to try another GIOVANNI product. I like spraying this Hemp Hydrating Hair Shine on my dry hair, and it really does add shine. I also love the scent. It smells yummy. I also like to comb it through my hair to put my hair back in a ponytail. It tames the frizz just a bit.

The bottle did come with oil covering the outside, but it's been over 100 degrees here, so it might've just been affected by the heat in travel. It cleaned off fine (and it was inside a ziplock bag). Review Title: Makes my hair shiny Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 24 Inches Synthetic Long Curly Blonde Wig Natural Wavy Hair NONE Lace Heat Resistant Wigs for Women Cosplay Costume Review Date: 2020/09/24 Store: AILIWEI Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.69 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'AILIWEI', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '6.69 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '710731915817'} Review Text: I've been picking up things for our Halloween costumes (even if we will just be enjoying together at home), and this is one of the things I added to our costumes barrel.

The wig went on well and was tried on by most members of my family. It is tight enough to keep the hairline from showing and stays put.

The hair quality, itself, is great! I am no wig expert (can count on one hand the times I've worn one), but this seems like a nice wig. Review Title: Nice wig! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pippa Of London Magic Star Eyeshadow Powder Pencil, Long Lasting, Blendable Eye Make Up Stick Review Date: 2021/01/08 Store: Pippa Of London Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Color': 'Chalfont 303 – a shimmering shade of pearl', 'Brand': 'Pippa Of London', 'Item Form': 'Stick, Pencil, Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.25 x 0.83 x 0.75 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Pippa of London', 'Country of Origin': 'United Kingdom'} Review Text: I wasn't sure I would like an eyeshadow pencil with a different colors on each side. It just seemed like it would be difficult to get one without the other. But really, it's not too bad.

The colors go on pretty well, even the lighter color does. They go on in a narrower line, of course, but then you can take your finger, or a brush, and spread it out to look more like an eyeshadow rather than a pencil. It's a little harder to apply under the eyes when you have a pencil design like this, but it's doable. (It is a powder, though, so it doesn't stay very well underneath the eyes.)

Overall, pretty colors, interesting pencil design, and a good product that I can recommend. Review Title: Pretty colors that go on nicely. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Magnesium Salt Bath Flakes | 8 lb Bulk Size | Body and Foot Soak | By Horbaach Review Date: 2021/04/14 Store: Horbäach Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Horbäach', 'Product Benefits': 'Relaxing', 'Unit Count': '128.0 Ounce', 'Item Weight': '8 Pounds', 'Variety': 'Bath Soak', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 3 x 15 inches; 8 Pounds', 'UPC': '840050601426', 'Manufacturer': 'Horbaach'} Review Text: I'm a bath taker and I always use either epsom salts or magnesium chloride flakes. You would think they'd all kind of be the same, but take it from me, they're not. Sometimes the salts are very difficult to dissolve and don't have the same feel. But these flakes are awesome! They dissolve easily and make the water feel so soft and lovely. I feel wonderful after bathing in these salts.

The package was popped open when it arrived, but I taped it up and it's held fine. Sometimes that happens with heavy bags being thrown in flimsy boxes.

The bag says to use 3 cups, but I usually do about 2, because I prefer having expensive magnesium chloride flakes last a little longer. Two cups is quite sufficient and is what is recommended with many other brands. Review Title: Dissolves well, works beautifully Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: C'est Moi Vanilla Vibes Sugar Balm Body Scrub | Invigorating & Hydrating Exfoliant, Clinically Tested Non-Toxic Ingredients feat. Organic Shea Butter, Coconut Oil & Avocado Oil, EWG Verified, 6 oz Review Date: 2021/04/30 Store: C'est Moi Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': "C'est Moi", 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sugar', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 3.5 x 2 inches; 6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'PR-COM-RT-X994317', 'UPC': '039897302607'} Review Text: Let me start by saying that I love body scrubs that leave my skin softened rather than feeling like it's been scrubbed to death and stripped of all moisture. My favorite has been Kiehl's Creme de Corps Soy Milk & Honey Body Polish, and I haven't really found anything that I like as much as that. I wanted to try this because I like the brand C'est Moi, and also because this product comes in a handy jar, which makes it so easy to scoop out and apply to skin.

Unfortunately, this product didn't live up to my expectations. It does have excellent exfoliators and feels like a good scrub for the skin all over my body, but the residue it leaves on my skin is icky. It's just too much - kind of feels like a coating of Crisco on my skin.

Also, the scent is odd. It doesn't smell like vanilla. It smells like... well, it's hard to explain. It's just off, and I had an aversion to it. Review Title: Greasy Residue and Scent is Odd Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MISS SPA Head to Toe Body and Facial Mask Set, Brighten Under-Eye, Deep Therapy Lip Mask, Moisturizing Foot Booties, Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle, Skin Care for Women, 3-Pack Review Date: 2021/05/25 Store: MISS SPA Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MISS SPA', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,All Skin Types', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.07 x 0.24 x 4.33 inches; 2.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '838623303099'} Review Text: First off, I really enjoyed the moisturizing foot booties. They were my favorite in this set. They were non-irritating and left my feet feeling super soft. (I put socks on immediately after so I wouldn't slip on my bamboo floors.)

The eye gels were decent. I didn't see any visible results (like de-puffing) but they felt nice.

The lip mask was unique! I didn't know lip masks existed. I panicked at first, feeling like I couldn't breathe, which is totally stupid, because I sit with my mouth closed all the time. I guess the thought of not breathing through my mouth for 20 minutes sent me into a panic. ha! It didn't feel like it did much to soften my lips, however, so not sure I'd put myself through that panic again (just teasing).

This is a cute set and would be a cute addition to a gift. Review Title: Decent set of Masks Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: YNN Y-Not-Natural Organic Kakadu Plum Extract Anti-Aging Moisturizer by Jillaroo – 100g | Vitamins E, C, A | Fragrance Free Advanced Skin Care and Wrinkle Removal (Kakadu Plum)… Review Date: 2021/06/30 Store: YNN Y-Not-Natural Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'YNN Y-Not-Natural', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '3.5274 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 1.85 x 1.81 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Y-Not Natural Aust Pty Ltd'} Review Text: This is a lovely moisturizer that leaves me skin feeling soft and hydrated. I'm 52 with mostly normal (occasionally a little dry) skin that only needs a bit extra moisture at night. I like to use this in the morning, as it's just the right amount of moisture to carry me through the day.

This is unscented and doesn't irritate my skin at all. It's a little runny, so the hole it comes out of is a tad big and sometimes dispenses too much all at once, but now that I know that, it's not too hard to control.

And not that it matters to some, but I think the packaging design is quite pretty. Review Title: Gentle, Unscented Moisturizer Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

Overall, pretty colors, interesting pencil design, and a good product that I can recommend. Review Title: Pretty colors that go on nicely. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Magnesium Salt Bath Flakes | 8 lb Bulk Size | Body and Foot Soak | By Horbaach Review Date: 2021/04/14 Store: Horbäach Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Horbäach', 'Product Benefits': 'Relaxing', 'Unit Count': '128.0 Ounce', 'Item Weight': '8 Pounds', 'Variety': 'Bath Soak', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 3 x 15 inches; 8 Pounds', 'UPC': '840050601426', 'Manufacturer': 'Horbaach'} Review Text: I'm a bath taker and I always use either epsom salts or magnesium chloride flakes. You would think they'd all kind of be the same, but take it from me, they're not. Sometimes the salts are very difficult to dissolve and don't have the same feel. But these flakes are awesome! They dissolve easily and make the water feel so soft and lovely. I feel wonderful after bathing in these salts.

The package was popped open when it arrived, but I taped it up and it's held fine. Sometimes that happens with heavy bags being thrown in flimsy boxes.

The bag says to use 3 cups, but I usually do about 2, because I prefer having expensive magnesium chloride flakes last a little longer. Two cups is quite sufficient and is what is recommended with many other brands. Review Title: Dissolves well, works beautifully Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: C'est Moi Vanilla Vibes Sugar Balm Body Scrub | Invigorating & Hydrating Exfoliant, Clinically Tested Non-Toxic Ingredients feat. Organic Shea Butter, Coconut Oil & Avocado Oil, EWG Verified, 6 oz Review Date: 2021/04/30 Store: C'est Moi Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': "C'est Moi", 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sugar', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 3.5 x 2 inches; 6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'PR-COM-RT-X994317', 'UPC': '039897302607'} Review Text: Let me start by saying that I love body scrubs that leave my skin softened rather than feeling like it's been scrubbed to death and stripped of all moisture. My favorite has been Kiehl's Creme de Corps Soy Milk & Honey Body Polish, and I haven't really found anything that I like as much as that. I wanted to try this because I like the brand C'est Moi, and also because this product comes in a handy jar, which makes it so easy to scoop out and apply to skin.

Unfortunately, this product didn't live up to my expectations. It does have excellent exfoliators and feels like a good scrub for the skin all over my body, but the residue it leaves on my skin is icky. It's just too much - kind of feels like a coating of Crisco on my skin.

Also, the scent is odd. It doesn't smell like vanilla. It smells like... well, it's hard to explain. It's just off, and I had an aversion to it. Review Title: Greasy Residue and Scent is Odd Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MISS SPA Head to Toe Body and Facial Mask Set, Brighten Under-Eye, Deep Therapy Lip Mask, Moisturizing Foot Booties, Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle, Skin Care for Women, 3-Pack Review Date: 2021/05/25 Store: MISS SPA Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MISS SPA', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,All Skin Types', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.07 x 0.24 x 4.33 inches; 2.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '838623303099'} Review Text: First off, I really enjoyed the moisturizing foot booties. They were my favorite in this set. They were non-irritating and left my feet feeling super soft. (I put socks on immediately after so I wouldn't slip on my bamboo floors.)

The eye gels were decent. I didn't see any visible results (like de-puffing) but they felt nice.

The lip mask was unique! I didn't know lip masks existed. I panicked at first, feeling like I couldn't breathe, which is totally stupid, because I sit with my mouth closed all the time. I guess the thought of not breathing through my mouth for 20 minutes sent me into a panic. ha! It didn't feel like it did much to soften my lips, however, so not sure I'd put myself through that panic again (just teasing).

This is a cute set and would be a cute addition to a gift. Review Title: Decent set of Masks Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: YNN Y-Not-Natural Organic Kakadu Plum Extract Anti-Aging Moisturizer by Jillaroo – 100g | Vitamins E, C, A | Fragrance Free Advanced Skin Care and Wrinkle Removal (Kakadu Plum)… Review Date: 2021/06/30 Store: YNN Y-Not-Natural Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'YNN Y-Not-Natural', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '3.5274 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 1.85 x 1.81 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Y-Not Natural Aust Pty Ltd'} Review Text: This is a lovely moisturizer that leaves me skin feeling soft and hydrated. I'm 52 with mostly normal (occasionally a little dry) skin that only needs a bit extra moisture at night. I like to use this in the morning, as it's just the right amount of moisture to carry me through the day.

This is unscented and doesn't irritate my skin at all. It's a little runny, so the hole it comes out of is a tad big and sometimes dispenses too much all at once, but now that I know that, it's not too hard to control.

And not that it matters to some, but I think the packaging design is quite pretty. Review Title: Gentle, Unscented Moisturizer Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

1. **Skincare and Beauty:**
   - **Eye Care:** Frequent use of eye masks for anti-aging and hydration; values products with effective ingredients.
   - **Hair Care:** Seeks moisturizing and shine-enhancing hair products; emphasizes fragrance and frizz control.

2. **Makeup Products:** 
   - Prefers convenient and blendable makeup tools, particularly eyeshadows with novel applications.

3. **Bath and Relaxation:**
   - Enjoys bathing rituals using specialized salts; prioritizes dissolvability and skin feel during and post-use.

4. **Body Care:**
   - Interested in body scrubs for softening effects; however, sensitive to residue and scent, impacting satisfaction.

5. **Product Attributes:**
   - Highlights affordability, ease of use, and quality formulation; tends to avoid heavily perfumed or irritating products.
   - Appreciates multifunctional beauty tools and treatments; values effective ingredients and results.

6. **Shopping Behavior:**
   - Engages in purchasing for personal use and to support family activities (e.g., costumes).
   - Reviews indicate a blend of experimentation within beauty genres and a desire for value, evidenced by repeated purchases from specific brands and product types.

target_interaction.title: Gentle Foaming Cleanser (Ingredients in Photo)
target_interaction.text:
This foaming cleanser is really nice! It has a lovely light scent and the foam dispenses well and feels great. It's good for cleansing pores, but it's also gentle enough to use on sensitive skin.

The ingredients are mostly natural (not sure why they didn't list them on the product page, but I've posted a picture that shows them).

Also, the price is right!
target_interaction.title_meta: ZENOTRI Rudios Fine Deep Forming Cleanser | Wash Face Weakly Acidic Cleansing Foam | Adsorption cleaning | Panthenol Citric Acid | 6.8 FL OZ
